page.title: 02A schoolboy's day.
page.content: My house is in the middle of the village.It is a quiet village now the by-pass has been built as no traffic passes through.I usually wake up at 8:00 a.m.,have my breakfast,get washed and dressed then do a few jobs before I go to school at 9:30 a.m. We have assembly and then go to our work.The lessons I like best are P.E.(Physical Education)and History with Mrs. Fraser the Headmistress,Art with Mrs. Whitfield and English and History with Ms. Blakemore. We have a school field where the boys play football and the girls play rounders.We have dinner in the canteen at 12:30 p.m.,there are three dinner ladies.Altogether there are three proper playtimes.We join in competitions and festivals and sports with other schools and also have our own school sports.
